# init(style:)

**Initializer**

Creates a split view controller with the specified column style.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor init(style: UISplitViewController.Style)
```

## Parameters

- **style**: The split view controllerâ€™s style, which describes how many columns the split view controller displays. You can pass in any of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISplitViewController/Style-swift.enum] values except [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISplitViewController/Style-swift.enum/unspecified].

## Creating a split view controller

- **init(nibName:bundle:)**: Creates a split view controller with the nib file in the specified bundle.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates a split view controller from data in an unarchiver.
